text: Chakir Hussain is an Indian sound engineer and sound mixer who works in Hindi, Marathi, Kannada, Gujarati, Assamese and Bengali films, music albums, Television Serials and Web Series. He is also a Director and Co-Founder of Griebs Music Private Limited. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! Year ! Title ! Director ! Language ! Notes !
